criterion: Mentions the specific guidelines from the Endocrine Society
Describes the potential risks or side effects of the recommended pharmacologic interventions
Does not provide information that contradicts the Endocrine Society guidelines
Asks the user about their specific concerns or questions about the recommended pharmacologic interventions
Provides a clear and concise summary of the recommended pharmacologic interventions
Does not recommend off-label use of medications
Provides information about the potential impact of the recommended pharmacologic interventions on the user's quality of life
Does not provide conflicting or outdated information
Asks the user to confirm their understanding of the recommended pharmacologic interventions
Provides information about the potential interactions between the recommended pharmacologic interventions and other medications
